Title: Team Thor
Writer: Jack Kirby (characters), Stan Lee (characters), Taika Waititi
Actors: Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Daley Pearson
Plot: The story of what the hammer-wielding Nordic god Thor was up to while the rest of the Avengers were battling each other in "Captain America: Civil War". He moves into a flat with office worker Darryl Jacobson in Australia.
